title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.19 - Priority of interests
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.19 - Priority of interests

State Regulations

The Department of Motor Vehicles acts only
administratively with respect to security interests, recording and filing of
liens and releases and noting liens on title certificates. The department does
not determine priority of interests between lienholders or the disposition of
proceeds upon sale of a vehicle after foreclosure or repossession. Such matters
are subject to determination in civil judicial proceedings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
20.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
